Hello world!

Hi guys. Back to writing again. It’s been a long time since I write something but I’m back to my rants again.

I have almost nothing here at the moment but you know how the story goes.

I’m using github pages and jekyll. It’s really a cool system for blogging because of the flexibility.

Have fun!
